pages.text: With the Dialing Device you can link a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_transmitter)Matter Transmitter$(/l) to a $(l:rftoolsutility:machines/matter_receiver)Matter Receiver$(/l). Note that the Matter Transmitter has to be nearby but the Matter Receiver can be very far away (even in another dimension)$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine reduces power usage

To dial you first have to select a Matter Transmitter. If there is only one nearby then it will be automatically selected. After that you have to select a Matter Receiver (in the bottom list) and chose either 'Dial' or 'Dial Once'. With 'Dial Once' the connection will be interrupted as soon as someone teleports
